messages.title: Let Down By Brown?
messages.content: In many ways, 13 years under Tony Blair and Gordon Brown have been bad years for Liverpool... Perhaps you wonder Gordon, Brown claims to be Margaret Thatcher's heir. But that is why more and more people are saying they need a local MP who will put fighting for Liverpool first, instead of another careerist Neo Labour politician from London.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Ladbrokes say Colin's Favourite To Win!

quotes.text: Prime Minister Gordon Brown compared himself to Margaret Thatcher and insisted he was the Iron Lady's true heir

images.caption: Prime Minister Gordon Brown compared himself to Margaret Thatcher and insisted he was the Iron Lady's true heir
